segments.advisor_message: So, hey there! Let’s chat about your insurance policies. Do you know who is the actual, like, owner of the policy?
segments.client_message: Um, yeah, I think it’s me, right? Just my name on all the papers.

segments.advisor_message: Cool, cool! And what type of protection are we lookin’ at? Like, is it Life Assurance or maybe Critical Illness Cover?
segments.client_message: Oh right, it’s a Life Assurance thing, I remember that. Pretty important stuff, I guess?

segments.advisor_message: Absolutely! So, who’s the provider? Which company is giving you this coverage?
segments.client_message: Oh, let me see... I think it’s, like, some big insurance company, um, Allianz or something like that. Can’t remember, haha!
